title: It’s Time for Financial Advisers to Help Clients Invest in Cryptocurrency
sub_head: It’s no longer a fad, and investors need to be aware of both the opportunities and the risks
body:
Maddy Dychtwald is an author and co-founder of Age Wave, a think tank and consultancy
About six months ago, I decided it was time to dip my toe into the cryptocurrency market. Like so many other investors, I like to keep my investments consolidated and don’t have the time or inclination to take a deep dive into learning the ins and outs of cryptocurrency investing on my own. I need a guide…a trusted adviser.
